content: Hi! While I was making a BodyHeight profile for my project I found that the binding was missing from the HCIM BodyHeight code. My guess is that it needs to be bound to the 'VitalSigns' valueset. Since this could cause validation errors, and I am not sure I am correct in my assumption, could this be fixed?

Hi Daniel,
Thanks for letting us know. We are aware of the issue, which was a bug in the snapshot generator Simplifier uses. The differential of the profile is correct, but the snapshot generator 'forgets' to include the base binding. I believe it has been solved or will be shortly and awaits a release on Simplifier.
For now, I would suggest taking a compatible, previous version of the profile if you find that this causes problems: https://simplifier.net/packages/nictiz.fhir.nl.stu3.zib2017/2.1.5/files/389781
Daniel Puttmann has marked this topic as resolved.
